body:
Hey guys! My first Nebula video is up, and I'd really appreciate if you'd check it out. Thanks ;D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W-yLK0-mU0A&feature=youtu.be
body_tagged:
Hey guys! My first Nebula video is up, and I'd really appreciate if you'd check it out. Thanks ;D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W-yLK0-mU0A&feature=youtu.be
title: Nebula #1 - DID I KILL A FULL DIAMOND?!?!?

replies.body: Nice! but try only record the game :P
replies.body_tagged: Nice! but try only record the game :P

replies.body:
Commentary: I think it's good enough. Keep it!
Video quality: 15fps  aren't looking very good at a 144hz display... I don't know if it is your computer, or your recording software. Maybe your software.
Audio quality: My tip is, get an other audio recorder, don't use the audio recorded which is bundled in to your screen recorder, because it's a little bit ... don't know how to say.... If you are using another audio recorder, make sure all settings are correct.

Other tIps: Play in full display resolution, make your videos longer and a thumbnail would be great too!

Wow I dealt so much knockback when I killed you :p
